message: I am sending my first single chat message.
That's great, glad to finally hear from you!
Yeah, it is good to be here at last
Ok, I'm going to attack you now.
Yes, and I am going to send a quite long message here, which you'll have to deal with as well as you are able.    I like to send long messages before attacking.
I am spamming this spam link: http://someproductsite.com/#virus-or-whatever
